Articles.Content:
So I have seen lots of cool and funny signatures over the forum, so if you think you have a cool siggy, post here to show everyone!

Mine is kinda lame:(

This isn't really the section for this; this section is more about the forum itself than the users of the forum. I'd move it to Forum Games, but there's already a signature-related topic there, so I think locking it is probably more apt. Feel free to go join in the endless signature displaying and rating going on in the Forum Games section, though!
